name: Fallentine
description:
Fallentine is a game about falling deeper and deeper... in love!

Ray has a crush on someone: a very special someone! But they'll soon find out that love is hard work! 

Use the arrow keys to move and press SPACE to fire your bow and arrow.

Strengthen your bond with your sweetheart by collecting hearts. 

You'll find these hearts inside boxes you can break with your arrows.

Watch out for obstacles like goons, who will try to take your hard earned hearts!

A Game by WishingWell Studios for Ludum Dare 48

Director, Designer, Programmer and Artist: Ian Kline

Composer: Sheridan Woika

Concept and QA: Navina Skye

Sound effects:  @shades

Font: apple_kid

Source code: https://github.com/lunchbreak1/LD48
